Submodules

arca.ste.eds module

class EDS

Bases: abc.ABC, Generic[arca.ste.eds.KeyType, arca.ste.eds.PlaintextInputType, arca.ste.eds.EdsType, arca.ste.eds.TokenInputType, arca.ste.eds.ResolveOutputType]

An interface representing a generic encrypted data structure.

This interface is intended to be used to define other types of encrypted data structures. See EDX and EMM for more specific instantiations of data structures.

abstract generate_key() → arca.ste.eds.KeyType

Generates a key for the encrypted data structure scheme.

Returns

a key

abstract encrypt(key: arca.ste.eds.KeyType, plaintext_ds: arca.ste.eds.PlaintextInputType) → bytes

Encrypts the given plaintext data structure with the given key and returns a byte string representing the encrypted data structure.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with, as generated from generate_key()

  • plaintext_ds¶ – the plaintext structure to encrypt

Returns

a serialized encrypted data structure

abstract load_eds(eds_bytes: bytes) → arca.ste.eds.EdsType

Deserializes a byte string representing an encrypted data structure into the type needed by the query() algorithm.

Parameters

eds_bytes¶ – a serialized encrypted data structure from encrypt()

Returns

a deserialized version of the encrypted data structure

abstract token(key: arca.ste.eds.KeyType, keyword: arca.ste.eds.TokenInputType) → bytes

Generates a search token for the given key and keyword.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to encrypt with

  • keyword¶ – the keyword to query the encrypted data structure with

Returns

a search token

abstract query(token: bytes, eds: arca.ste.eds.EdsType) → Optional[bytes]

Returns a result for the given search token queried over the given encrypted data structure.

Parameters

  • token¶ – a search token generated by token()

  • eds¶ – the encrypted data structure from load_eds()

Returns

a serialized response to pass to resolve()

abstract resolve(key: arca.ste.eds.KeyType, response: bytes) → arca.ste.eds.ResolveOutputType

Resolves the serialized response returned by the server into a native List[ResolveOutputType].

If the encrypted data structure is response-hiding, the given key is also used to decrypt the response.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to decrypt with

  • response¶ – the serialized response from query()

Returns

a list of plaintext values
